meanings.sent3: His alcoholisms were so extreme that he mistook a lamp post for a person.

meanings.sent5: The consequences of her alcoholisms were evident in her relationships and work performance.

meanings.definition: The habitual or excessive consumption of alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: The party culture in college often leads to alcoholisms among students.

meanings.sent3: Trying to impress his friends, he displayed his alcoholisms by chugging a whole bottle.
